document.body:
Trusted Reviews What would you like to review?
TalusWeb started out as the trusted source for online web reviews around the world. We scour the Internet for interesting websites that can be useful to our lives, review them and present an online guide to the web. Whether you are starting a new interesting website, own a blog or found a useful website, we invite you to submit the url and review of the site. Our editors will review your submission and only reviews that meet our quality guidelines will be published. We have now expanded our site to include reviews on products, gadgets, games and services.
Recent Reviews
www.ePayItOnline.com - ePay Online www.epayitonline.com is the online payment system for providers such as Regional Medical Imaging, Radiological Associates of Sacramento, Advanced Medical Imaging and other providers. If you have visited any of this provider, you will have a code id and access number that can... - read more...
www.GiftCardMall.com/mygift - Gift Card Mall MyGift Www.GiftCardMall.com/MyGift is the site through which, if you own one of these cards, you can register it to make a purchase over mail, online and/or over telephone. This card is actually a Visa Prepaid Gift card, which acts as a prepaid debit card and is accepted by all the... - read more...
www.tellkroger.com - Tell Kroger Customer Satisfaction Survey Kroger Customer Satisfaction survey site is found at www.tellkroger.com . To get started , you need your receipt. You should be able to find a date, time, store number, terminal number, transaction number, operator number and the survey entry code. By providing your feedback, you... - read more...
www.KillsBugsDead.com - Raid Max Bug Barrier www.KillsBugsDead.com is the website for Raid insecticide. SC Johnson brands have always had a very following with respect to the domestic consumers. They provide some of the best cleaning and insect killing solutions available in the market. Raid is one their leading insect... - read more...
www.DennysListens.com - Dennys Restaurant Survey www.DennysListens.com is a website owned by Denny’s chain of restaurants having various franchisee and headquartered in South Carolina, United States. Customers to the restaurant are required to complete the Guest Satisfaction Survey by entering the survey code in the... - read more...
www.RiteAid.com/Feedback - Rite Aid Pharmacy Survey www.riteaid.com/feedback Rite Aid is the type of pharmacy which takes its customer service seriously as they try to ensure each customer receives that personal assistance which will keep them coming back for more. As a part of their mission to serve the pharmacy engages their... - read more...
www.TalkToSonic.com - Sonic Survey Coupon Sonic Drive-In is a fast food restaurant chain in the United States. Every day it offers over 3 million customers, like you, the facility to drive in their automobiles in any of its more than 3,500 restaurants and enjoy dining. It was established in 1953 and is currently operational... - read more...
www.TellPayless.com - Payless Shoe Survey www.TellPayless.com is the survey website for Payless Shoe store which is shoe retail chain that sells shoes at great low prices. If you have purchased your shoes at Payless store recently, you can now go to the website to complete the survey by answering some questions regarding... - read more...
www.WhatABurgerSurvey.com - What A Burger Survey Free Hamburger Www.Whataburgersurvey.com is the site through which the management of the WhataBurger Restaurants LP strives to gather your views about the quality of its food items and services in any of its outlets. For this reason, it encourages you to participate in its customer survey and share your most... - read more...
www.Lowes.IWRSurvey.com - Lowes IWR Survey Lowe's is the largest home improvement warehouse available in the country and is located across the country from coast to coast. Any person thinking of a home modification activity will head directly to the Lowe's web site and search for the required information. Lowe's also provide excellent... - read more...
